extendedInfo.description: Advanced Home ButtonFeatures:1). set double-tap home button application2). change/disable Samsung Galaxy S II double-tap home function.How to use:1). Clear your launcher by default( Settings->Applications->Your Launcher->Clear defaults )2). Set Advanced Home Button as default launcher( Click home button )3). Click the buttons in this app.Enjoy!!!

reviews.title: Work for one thing but not for other
reviews.comment: Now I can use my home bottom to lunch the apparently I want by press twice. Yet, then if I want to get back to my home screen there\'s nothing I can do, beside keep pressing the go back key. Press once = nothing happened.  Press twice. = camera (my ideal apparently)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just horrible
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work for my S2 rooted 4.2.2 Paranoid Android and unrooted 4.1.2. Doesn\'t say what it does and also tried on S3. And I obviously done everything and doesn\'t work. Dev need to have more support for roms and other phones.
reviews.author: Ian Neo

reviews.title: PERFECT
reviews.comment: it works perfectly to me, you guys, I know whays wrong with you, you are simply STUPID!!  when you lunch this app, there are 2 buttons to use: - Set the app to lunch when u double tap  AND a BBOUTTON WHERE YOU ARE SUPPOSED TO SET YOUR DEFAULT LAUNCHER. so use them both, don\'t be stupid...
reviews.author: Hachlaf Mourad

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Works well does what it says on the tin. Removes vlingo. And allows access to any app via double tab .. GalaxyS II 4.0.3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: galaxy S2 - works as advertised!
reviews.comment: It disables the default home double tap as promised. in order to assign a new function pls follow instructions: in app manager choose TWlauncher (thats the default S2 launcher) and click on reset defaults. And the S2 hack, as stated, is irreversible. You can\'t set it back to voice commands, the default home button double tap configuration.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: One BIG Problem
reviews.comment: This mod works great for me. The extra shortcut is a massive concenience.  *TAKE NOTE HERE, DEV*  I once booted my phone to have no launcher load, and instead I was only able to get to my music app through doubletap function. This could have been potentially crippling, and I understand why other people gave this a very low rating.  The reliability of this app/mod at boot needs to be seriously increased, or else people will be practically bricking their phone if the app fails to start the default launcher.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Broke the home button
reviews.comment: I followed the instructions and after rebooting, I don\'t see the home screen anymore.  What\'s worse is that the single click home button doesn\'t work.  Slow double click does go to the app that I reprogrammed to which was Vlingo.  A quick double click goes to the default Voice Command application.  Now I\'m going to uninstall this and hope everything goes back to normal (since I still have access to Task Manager via holding Home key).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy s2
reviews.comment: Didn\'t work, didn\'t break anything but tried the Samsung galaxy hack and it didn\'t work. Shame all I want to do is get rid of the double tap home button.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works on Galaxy SIII
reviews.comment: Tentatively, this seems to work on a galaxy S III running JB, but I had already uninstalled S Voice and most of the other Samsung apps and I also am rooted. Will advise again in a few weeks.    UPDATE: I\'ve noticed that when I press the home button while using the launcher, this app causes the launcher to restart, and doesn\'t send the \'home\' signal to the launcher. Can be frustrating when trying to go to my main screen.
reviews.author: Kevin Landrigan

reviews.title: solution - if your homescreen becomes black
reviews.comment: I have SG2. After installing this app the phone \"got lost\", but i saved it! :D This is how:  Long press the home button, select task manager, then downloaded, find \"advanced home button\" and delete it! the next time you press home ut will ask you to choose program, select your favorite and its done.  hope it was helpfull!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Extremely buggy
reviews.comment: Slows my Galaxy S2 to a halt.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Slight bug on Droid2G
reviews.comment: Double press only works when I\'m on the home screen. When I\'m on an app and I double press home, I\'m transferred to home, and not my double press app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Having problems mentioned by others, only works on slow double press
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Finally!!!
reviews.comment: Have to use the hack which requires root but finally disabled that awful function.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Alright
reviews.comment: Crashed my phone a bit. Works as advertised, would be good if once in the launcher, it returned to the homescreen if home button was pressed again
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Funciona
reviews.comment: Realmente deshabilita la opci\303\263n de double click sobre el bot\303\263n home en mi sgs2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Phone freeze
reviews.comment: Piece of crap app
reviews.author: Steven Nguyen

reviews.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
reviews.comment: This app killed my phone, causing it to stop loading the homescreen or allow access to task manager, i now have to do a hard reset of my galaxy s2 because i cant access my phone anymore.  this app should be taken off the market.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Did not disable my double tap.. utterly useless.

reviews.title: Dont use this
reviews.comment: Hey, i want my home button working now!! Dont use this f@*#*!! Tool, result: you will have to reset by odin tool
